It is easy to see the influence of those earlier VR games on the new exercise and fitness software from Within, but … [+2141 chars]

articles.description: In Other Waters, from developer Jump Over The Age, is a unique game that takes place entirely on a map interface. It’s out now on Windows PC and Nintendo Switch.
articles.content:
